CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Sacks Parente Golf, Inc. is a technology-forward golf company, with a portfolio of golf products, including putting instruments, golf shafts, golf grips, and other golf-related products. The Company designs, manufactures and sells technology-forward, golf equipment. Its segments include golf putting instruments, golf shafts, and golf-related products. It designs golf products to fit golfers of all skill levels, amateur and professional. Its equipment includes putting instruments, golf shafts and grips. Its putting instruments are made of steel, aluminum, titanium alloys, carbon fiber, tungsten, and various other materials, including its magnesium face plate technologies. All of its products are sold under the SPG brand. It offers custom fitting programs online to help consumers find the fit for their personal specifications. In addition, it sells to corporate customers who want certain customizations of its golf equipment. Its products are sold in the Americas, Asia, and Europe.
